item.title: Start blogging with hugo and org.
item.description: Create Hugo Site. Hugo is a great tool to create static websites, and now with the power of emacs and org mode this can be as easy as Chatting online. So lets get started. Dreaming of Theming There are many ways to add a hugo theme . Today we are gonna use the go submodule to install theme. First start a new hugo site with hugo new site <site name> cd <site name> There would be a config.
